data.title: Mahathir Bin Mohamad
data.meta_description: Mahathir Bin Mohamad - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Mahathir bin Mohamad was the fourth Prime Minister of Malaysia, holding the position from 1981 to 2003. This made him Malaysia's longest-serving Prime Minister. Prior to becoming Prime Minister, he held other government roles such as Deputy Prime Minister and Secretary General of the Non-Aligned Movement. As Prime Minister, Mahathir oversaw Malaysia's rapid modernization and economic growth. He implemented major constitutional changes that reduced the power of the country's monarchs. Mahathir remained an influential figure after retiring from politics.
